‚ú¶ Luxury Wedding Invitations ‚ú¶

Preet Cards Crafting Wedding Dreams Since 2017

Where tradition meets elegance. We create bespoke wedding invitations that tell your unique love story with the artistry of centuries-old Indian craftsmanship.

Explore Collections Book Consultation

‚ú¶ Our Legacy ‚ú¶

A Story Woven in Gold

Excellence in Every Invitation

Founded in 2017 by Mahesh Vaghela, Preet Cards began in Vadodara, Gujarat. What started with a passion for beautiful invitations has blossomed into one of the region's most trusted wedding invitation boutiques.

Today, under the creative direction of the third generation, we blend time-honored techniques with contemporary design sensibilities. Each invitation is a labor of love, taking up to 40 hours of meticulous craftsmanship to perfect.

8 Years of Excellence
5,000+ Happy Customers
100+ Design Collections
10+ Cities Served

‚ú¶ The Journey ‚ú¶

Our Design Process

From first consultation to final delivery, experience a seamless journey of creation.

01

Consultation

Share your wedding vision, theme, and preferences. Our designers understand your story and cultural nuances.

02

Design Concept

Within 7 days, receive 3 unique design concepts. Each concept includes mood boards and detailed sketches.

03

Refinement

Collaborate with our designers to perfect every detail. Unlimited revisions until you're completely satisfied.

04

Sample Approval

Receive a physical sample of your finalized design. Experience the paper quality, printing, and finishing firsthand.

05

Crafting

Our artisans bring your design to life using traditional techniques combined with modern precision printing.

06

Delivery

Beautifully packaged invitations delivered to your doorstep. White-glove delivery available for local orders.
